participant.Description: id generated at random in 9000-9100 range

AgeGroup.Description: Young: 20-30 years old at time of experiment, inclusive. Old: 65-75 years old at time of experiment, inclusive.

EducationLevel.Description: self-rated by participant, Har avslutat grundskolan = finished primary school, Har avslutat gymnasieskolan = finished secondary school, Studerar för nävarande på universitet/högskola = Student at university, Har examen från universitet/högskola = Has degree from university

HADS_Anxiety.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression scale, Anxiety subscale

HADS_Depression.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression scale, Depression subscale

IRI_EC.Description: Interpersonal Reactivity Index, Empathic Concern subscale

IRI_PT.Description: Interpersonal Reactivity Index, Perspective Taking subscale

IRI_PD.Description: Interpersonal Reactivity Index, Personal Distress subscale

TAS20_DIF.Description: Toronto Alexithymia Scale-20, Difficulty Identifying Feelings subscale

TAS20_DDF.Description: Toronto Alexithymia Scale-20, Difficulty Describing Feelings subscale

TAS20_EOT.Description: Toronto Alexithymia Scale-20, Externally Oriented Thinking subscale

PANAS_Positive.Description: Positive and Negative Affect Scale, Positive

PANAS_Negative.Description: Positive and Negative Affect Scale, Negative

MenstrualPhaseSession1.Description: determined by participants' self-reported dates for last menstruation if applicable

MenstrualPhaseSession2.Description: determined by participants' self-reported dates for last menstruation if applicable

SleepDeprivedSession1.Description: experimenter's guess about participant's condition, for validation of blinding

SleepDeprivedSession2.Description: experimenter's guess about participant's condition, for validation of blinding

EverBeenInStudyBefore.Description: whether participant has been in fMRI or experimental psychology experiment before, self-report yes/no

SawThroughEMGElectrodes.Description: Whether participant realised that electrodes on face were for EMG

SawThroughZPG.Description: Whether participant realised that opponents in Zürich Prosocial Game were not real

Contraceptives.Description: Self-reported use of female sex hormones. Minipills = progestogen-only oral contraceptive pills, Combined = combined oral contraceptive pills, P-stav = contraceptive implant, Estrogen = oral estrogen supplementation after menopause, Local estrogen = local estrogen supplementation after menopause

OtherDrugs.Description: Self-reported use of any other drugs. Coded in Swedish. Proprietary drug names can be looked up e.g. on fass.se to find the active substance.

GeneralImpression1.Description: Participants' self-reported general impression of the experiment session 1, reported in Swedish and coded in English by the experimenter

GeneralImpression2.Description: Participants' self-reported general impression of the experiment session 2, reported in Swedish and coded in English by the experimenter

PVTEffort1.Description: Rated effort during Psychomotor Vigilance Test session 1, 1-5

PVTEffort2.Description: Rated effort during Psychomotor Vigilance Test session 2, 1-5

PVTMotivation1.Description: Rated motivation during Psychomotor Vigilance Test session 2, 1-5

PVTMotivation1.1.Description: Rated motivation during Psychomotor Vigilance Test session 2, 1-5

FellAsleepSession1.Description: Self-report of whether participants fell asleep during scanning, session 1

FellAsleepSession2.Description: Self-report of whether participants fell asleep during scanning, session 2

StrategyARROWS.Description: Self-reported strategy for cognitive reappraisal, coded by experimenter in English

SelfRatedHealth_byScanner.x.Description: Self-rated health right now, 7-point scale, acquired at scanning session 1

SRH5_byScanner.x.Description: Self-rated health in general, 5-point scale, acquired at scanning session 1

PANAS_Positive_byScanner.x.Description: Positive and Negative Affect Scale, Positive, acquired at scanning session 1

PANAS_Negative_byScanner.x.Description: Positive and Negative Affect Scale, Negative, acquired at scanning session 1

SelfRatedHealth_byScanner.y.Description: Self-rated health right now, 7-point scale, acquired at scanning session 2

SRH5_byScanner.y.Description: Self-rated health in general, 5-point scale, acquired at scanning session 2

PANAS_Positive_byScanner.y.Description: Positive and Negative Affect Scale, Positive, acquired at scanning session 2

PANAS_Negative_byScanner.y.Description: Positive and Negative Affect Scale, Negative, acquired at scanning session 2

PPIR_ME.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Machiavellian Egocentricity subscale

PPIR_RN.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Rebellious Nonconformity subscale

PPIR_BE.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Blame Externalization subscale

PPIR_CN.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Careless Nonplanfulness subscale

PPIR_SOI.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Social Influence subscale

PPIR_STI.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Stress Immunity subscale

PPIR_VR.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Virtuous Responding subscale

PPIR_DR.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Deviant Responding subscale

PPIR_IR15.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Inconsistent Responding-15 subscale

PPIR_IR40.Description: Psychopathic Personality Inventory-Revised, Inconsistent Responding-40 subscale

Sl_cond.Description: Sleep randomisation condition. 1 = sleep deprivation before first session, 2 = sleep deprivation before second session

Trial.Description: Trial counterbalancing condition governing event order in trial lists during fMRI experiments
